articles.title: See peach fuzz, Pantone's color of the year for 2024 - CBS News
articles.description: Pantone has announced its Color of the Year for 2024. The color institute's experts decided on Peach Fuzz, a peach tone described as "velvety" and "gentle."
articles.content: Pantone has unveiled its color of the year for 2024: Peach Fuzz, a soft peach-beige that the company of color aficionados says is meant to embody "our desire to nurture ourselves and others." The hue… [+4455 chars]
